entry.title: Importing vCard contacts into an LG 420G
entry.summary: Alix recently acquired an LG 420G from TracFone. She was interested in getting all of her contacts onto the phone, which at first seemed like a simple task – transfer a vCard (.vcf) file to the phone via Bluetooth, and the phone would import all the contacts. This turned out to be a great idea in theory, but in practice there was a fatal flaw – while the phone did indeed import the contacts, it only imported names and the occasional note or email address.
